name: 2073: Space Ship
description:
2073: Space Ship
A Game made for Gameform GameJam!

The year is 2073, collect stars to generate energy for your ship while dodging meteors, laser beams and space junk! 

Movement: ⬅, ➡, ⬇, ⬆.

Creators:

2D Artist: https://linktr.ee/douglas.castro

3D Artist: https://luizleao.carrd.co/

Programmer: https://linktr.ee/everton.gamedev
